page.body_html:
This is the "Global Home"

This configuration feaures:

  • A global home page. This can also be a redirect to the user's browser locale, or the default locale etc

  • A fallback configuration. The base language is currently set to en

  • The smart-copy translation plugin. This plugin is a workflow plugin that allows authors will scope pages into "translation" by copying them from one locale to another.  Once copied, a translation workflow (automated, assistend or manual can take place.)
